text: @brithume "Very reasonable viewpoint?" Well, not for my parents! BTW, when have you gone with the Lt. Governor to visit a hospital with Coronavirus patients? Have you volunteered to help them in any manner? Have you worked to get gloves, masks, supplies for our medical workers? NO!
